title: Problem-Based Social Inquiry Project in Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science reasoning skills and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment where students investigate and propose solutions to real-world social issues

learning_goals: Learners apply at least three collaborative problem-solving strategies in blended (online/offline) environments
Learners collect and analyze data related to real-world social issues using mobile devices

During a 5-day PBL (Problem-Based Learning) project, learners fulfill 6+ of 8 teacher-provided checklist items, develop weekly learning plans, and submit daily execution records to demonstrate self-directed learning skills.
Learners communicate with team members on digital platforms to visualize and present solutions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
